text:
@CNNPolitics It's about time that trump's base leaves him on the Coronavirus pandemic. First he RIDICULED, then it was to MAGICALLY go away, then SHUNNED face coverings NOW he ignores.

Every. Single. Blue. Vote. is needed November
Don't be complacent
Remember Hillary's polls? 
Well, WE LOST!
